Package net.tridentsdk.server.threads

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundTaskExecutor
    Executes background tasks that don't matter too much to the actual server
    ConcurrentCache<K,V>
    Cache wrapping ConcurrentHashMap
    ConcurrentTaskExecutor<Assignment>
    Thread list to allow task execution in a shared thread scaled with removal
    EntityThreads
    Entity handling thread manager, there are 2 thread by default
    MainThread
    Handles the running of the server, the "ticks" that occur 20 times a second
    PlayerThreads
    Player handling thread manager, 4 threads by default
    PluginThreads  
    ThreadsManager
    Handles the majority of the lifecycle for the threads
    WorldThreads
    World handling threads, which there are by default 4
